## hpr1400 :: How We Use Linux

 
MythTV 


https://www.mythtv.org/

https://www.mythtv.org/wiki/



Samba File Server 


https://www.howtoforge.com/setting-up-a-linux-file-server-using-samba



NFS File Server 


https://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php? t=249889 



OwnCloud 


https://owncloud.org/

https://www.howtoforge.com/running-owncloud3-on-nginx-lemp-on-debian-squeeze-ubuntu-11.10



TinyTinyRss 


https://tt-rss.org/redmine/projects/tt-rss/wiki

https://www.webupd8.org/2013/05/tiny-tiny-rss-ubuntu-ppa-google-reader.html



Mumble 
murmur - server 
mumble - client 


https://mumble.sourceforge.net/Running_Murmur



Icecast 


https://www.howtoforge.com/linux_webradio_with_icecast2_ices2



BUTT (Broadcast Using This Tool) 


https://butt.sourceforge.net/



Xbian


https://www.xbian.org/



Elgg


https://elgg.org/

https://www.plexapp.com/
